website_summaries.verdict: Bright gender neutral tea set that will appeal to many children of different ages.
pros: Pieces are easy to clean and durable
Dishwasher safe on the top rack
Not too big or too small
Holds up well through rough toddler play
cons: The plastic on this set is not recycled and is a little thinner construction than some others available

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Tea Set that is not Pink!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for my grandson - boys grow up and drink and eat too! He began to play with it as soon as it was out of the box. Nice and durable with loads of imaginary play. The saucers are actually plates, perfect for a teddy bear and/or Ninja Turtle lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Smith

customer_reviews.title: Safe and durable tea set
customer_reviews.text: This is the tea set I bought for my grandkids. I bought this one specifically because of the neutral colors and the plastic is bpa free. My 8 month old grandson was playing with one of the cups and I noticed the rim was thick enough to not be sharp. This was exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: mysteryfan

customer_reviews.title: This is brilliant. I just watched my granddaughter on Skype giving ...
customer_reviews.text: This is brilliant. I just watched my granddaughter on Skype giving her soft toy pals a tea-party and exploring scientific principles (eg how much water can you pour into a SAUCER before it overflows?) I spent a lot of time trying to find a set that was a) unbreakable b) not made of pink with purple butterflies and c) had a proper round teapot. I did succeed in the end - I was delighted when I found your set! Also it was delivered promptly and all that stuff. keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: nell uk

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the neutral colors because boys like to play with ...
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought, but my son loves it. I enjoy the neutral colors because boys like to play with tea sets and pots and pans just anyone else. While he'd play with any color, even pink (he doesn't care), it's still nice to see the colors that Kidzlane provides. A great 5-star product!
customer_reviews.author: N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: If this were almost double the size it would be better for toddlers. Might be good toy for those tiny little elves that hang out in the meadow at night. Just too small to do much with but did manage to keep my granddaughter busy in the pool. We threw them, she fetched. They floated. Not crazy about the size of the forks, spoons, etc. Especially for little ones who could readily swallow. We watched her like a hawk with those.
customer_reviews.author: Appl

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected and has a few small plastic burrs on rims
customer_reviews.text: For my 3 1/2 yr old grandson. He loves to have tea parties so I was happy to see a set that wasn't pink. Order arrived quickly. I was surprised at how small the set actually is but like the fact it has mugs instead of teacups. At first glance, was disappointed it was packaged in a net and not something more sturdy so it could be picked up. He has a place for everything that he plays with. One other thing (most important)--several pieces have rough places on the lips.I may try to sand them down. I wouldn't buy this set again--would probably go with Amazon's Choice.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn King

customer_reviews.title: Great tea set!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have faithfully used two different tea sets for pretend play over the years. They were both cute, but didn't stand up to the real water and real snacks that my children were using. One of the pretty colored metal sets had some water left in it and rusted in the bottom. The other plastic with princess stickers couldn't stand up to the wear. This set is perfect. It's already been used. The cups and tea pot hold water. All of the pieces are washable (I washed by hand, not dishwasher.) It's a great price point and the colors are terrific for both my son and daughter. I did envision a slightly thicker plastic, but this is great.
customer_reviews.author: C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a birthday gift and was a little embarrassed when I saw actual tea set out of the box. It looks cheap and since it's plain basic colors, it isn't very interesting at all. I was looking for a set that could actually be used and not be toxic and thought this would be it but after seeing the box with NO info about safety of the plastic, I wonder about that too.
customer_reviews.author: Rivka

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter had outgrown her first little tea set. She also wanted one that held something to drink. This is perfect. Components are bigger than a typical kids set. Sort iOf a midsize.
customer_reviews.author: XXB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and makes great memories!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great little tea set and made for several fun nights drinking tea with the kids after dinner. We love the set and the time spent with our children. The set is complete and fun colors. I do with it was a bit thicker plastic, but seems to hold up well. I’ll also cool the tea a bit before putting it in the pot only because I’m not sure the plastic could hold up to 190 degrees, and also so the kids wont burn their mouths. All in all a great play set for the money and makes great memories.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Plastic
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old granddaughter was delighted when she opened them up. The teapot was the hit.. holds a lot of liquid.. the spoons a little small, but will do. Overall satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: Connie V.

customer_reviews.title: MY ESL STUDENTS LEARN WORDS TEA, CUP, SPOON, & tea party!
customer_reviews.text: As a tutor of English as a second Language, my students learn to speak words about a TEA PARTY along with script. COLORFUL AND LIGHTWEIGHT SET. tHE YOUNG CHILDREN CAN PRETEND TO POUR TEA THEMSELVES. Came in a colorful tea party box for storage. 5 STARS Sheralee Hill Iglehart B.S.,M.A.TUTOR/TEACHER
customer_reviews.author: Sheralee Hill Iglehart

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson Just Loves This Set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is just perfect for a tea party! I purchased this for my 4 year old Grandson's "Restaurant". The size of the teapot and accessories is just right. Not too small or large. It's about time that tea sets like this one are made with primary colors. This set is great!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: We love this set because it is nicely made
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking a tea set that wasn't glass and wasn't cheaply made. We love this set because it is nicely made, doesn't leak, and the plastic is pretty think so it is not easily breakable. The cups don't really look like "tea cups" more like mugs but they are larger which my girls preferred! I love the fact that I can through it all in the dishwasher and not have to worry about it. We also love the color because it isn't super "girly."
customer_reviews.author: mdauphin

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable and in the tradition of tea time allows for colorful interaction
customer_reviews.text: I have already written a review in response to a request for one. However I don’t mind writing another. The product is exactly How featured and described and is of excellent quality. Arrived in lightening speed. What sold me on in were the costumer reviews: 1)That it is perfect for little boys as well as girls; 2) that someone bought it for a a three year old grandson who loved it 3) the colors are bright and fun; and 4) that it’s durable. My opinion it’s all that. Great for learning and easy to grasp for the little hands. Generously equipped for four! What joy.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Our two-and-a-half-year-old granddaughter received this tea set for Christmas, and she absolutely loves it! The colors are bright and the plastic is sturdy. The pieces are just the right size for little hands. She personally enjoys spooning miniature marshmallows from the sugar bowl and "drinking" them from her cup. And the really nice thing is you can actually put liquids into the teapot and the cups (unlike her other tea set) and pretend you're really having tea. I am definitely pleased with this set.
customer_reviews.author: iluvnani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Useable ~ cleanable and FUN. Tea parties with grandchildren, what can be better than that? It's a little smaller than I thought it would be ~ but it works! It is just what I was hoping to find for a "real" tea party. No metal and washable!
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Great for actual liquid
customer_reviews.text: My son is already not fooled by fake tea parties so my husband and I put Snapple in this tea set and he has a blast. We even dress up (his teddy bear included) and it’s fun for everyone. Highly recommend if you want a set you can wash and drink out of.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Functional tea set
customer_reviews.text: I like this tea set a lot, it enables my kids to have an actual tea party with water. One pot fills all 4 cups and then some. The top doesn't fall off the actual tea pot unless you are filling a cup with the last few drops left in it. It makes for a fun tea party. I gave it 4 stars because it lacks a tray and its colors and cups are very basic...it would have been nice if it were a little more fancy. But functionally it is perfect, we have very happy tea parties!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Great for hosting a 'real' kids tea party
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a while, for a tea set that my 2-year old could play with. She loves to have tea parties with 'real' tea and food but most sets were not designed for that, or had cups that were way too small. This is the perfect size, and I was pleasantly surprised by the good quality.
customer_reviews.author: H.M.

customer_reviews.title: Cups do not look like tea cups
customer_reviews.text: The set itself was well constructed and lasted through some heavy duty 4 year olds. However, the cups looks more regular drinking cups that actual teacups. In fact, the kids that got this set would go over to the other tables and get "real teacups" If your going to make a tea set sure it looks like one. Otherwise it was great sturdy plastic, perfectly sized for the kids. the tea kettle will continue to be used but the cups have been downgraded to sandbox duty.
customer_reviews.author: Amberly

customer_reviews.title: EVEN BOYS LIKE TEASETS
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old grandson is out numbered with all his girl cousins. He would fight them for the teapot, so I got him his own. He loves filling it up with water and pouring it into the cups. (This is while he's outside and in his sandbox.)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Colors great for all kids!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 and a half year old loves to serve pretend tea with cream and sugar. The colors of the tea set are perfect. The pot itself is made of less likely to break softer plastic. The smaller items of hard plastic. Makes sense. It is an all-throughout-the-day event in his little kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Shockley

customer_reviews.title: A gender neutral tea set!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this set is not pink because I have a little boy with special needs who can benefit from practicing life skills such as pouring. Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: kourtney

customer_reviews.title: Great tea party set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to have tea parties with my nieces and nephews. They range from ages 3-17. The cups were a good size for both the 3 and 17 year old. The teapot held a 12 ounce can of juice with room to spare. The teapot was able to fill all of the cups. The lid on the teapot is not secured, so can spill if tipped too far but did not leak otherwise. I filled the sugar dish with small trears since we didn't need sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal4646

customer_reviews.title: This year I added more spoons and forks and a set of really nice small tall glasses to serve other beverages
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandniece for Christmas last year (2017) and she takes it between her home and her grandparents (both). She loves to serve tea. This year I added more spoons and forks and a set of really nice small tall glasses to serve other beverages. The quality is really nice and you could not ask for a better tea set for a child. One of the best I have come across.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real tea parties
customer_reviews.text: Great tea set for our REAL tea parties. My girl wanted to have a real tea party and al of the play sets would either run or didn’t hold liquid. These were a great find and allow us to have tea (water) to sip on during our parties
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Little Ones!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a basic, unbreakable tea set that would work for boy and girl since I have twin grandkids that are 2 1/2. They love this set! Bright colors, not pastels. Sturdy and so happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great tea set!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, sturdy plastic. All the pieces needed for a pleasant tea party with my favorite little guy. It can be difficult to find a tea set for a young man if you don't want pink and flowers. This one fit perfectly. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: That_Lady

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for my grandson who likes to cook
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This was perfect for my grandson who likes to cook. The colors are gender neutral. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: marge828

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3yo granddaughter. She plays with it and likes it. It doesn't have any fancy bells or whistles - have to use your imagination. It's a good standard set if you're looking for cups, saucers, spoons, sugar and creamer. The teapot is a little on the small side, but she plays with it and no complaints. Lots of spoons which is nice and it's pretty and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: jelo

customer_reviews.title: grandson loves
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old grandson has wanted a coffee/tea set and everything I find is very girly.....but when I saw this set it was perfect for him and he loves it!! And his 7 year old brother even humors him and plays with him with it! Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Chipman

customer_reviews.title: Very durable. can use with real tea. Easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: These are better made than I expected my kids use real tea n them and I hand wash them they love this set and it's even survived dad's feet so definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Zol

customer_reviews.title: Works well with water
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as a bath toy. I figured it would be fun in the bath and teach him to pour (he is almost 2) The night he got it, he spent about 45 mins playing with it before even putting it in the bath. About 3 weeks in and he still uses it every night. I'll put bath color tablets in the kettle. Quality is just fine for our use
customer_reviews.author: H. HunTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: High quality toys
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy plastic. My toddler loves it! Quality is superb. Holds water and doesn't leak (none of those tiny holes at the bottoms from manufacturing). Colors are bright. This will be a set in our play kitchen for many years!
customer_reviews.author: The Artisan Shoppe

customer_reviews.title: Great tea set for a little biy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 pretty, girly tin tea sets for my 3 grand-daughters. and this plastic tea set for my grand-son. it is durable, well-made, and looks like it will last a good long time. The colors are bright, and perfect for a little boy. My only complaint - suggestion, really - is that the set did not include a tray. The tin sets inclused a tray, and my grand-son was a little upset that his dod not. OTHERWISE HE WAS VERY PLEASED WITH IT.
customer_reviews.author: ralph epp

customer_reviews.title: Cute Tea Set that you can actually use
customer_reviews.text: Great tea set that both my grandson and granddaughter loved. We actually used the cups and tea pot for our "tea" (used chocolate milk). The colors are primary so not gender specific.
customer_reviews.author: Greenville Native

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Previously purchased another child's tea set that was nice but glass and smaller too fragile for everyday play. This set is a great size for my grandkids ranging in ages from 3-7, they have enjoyed many hours of tea party play.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old special needs granddaughter loves these tea sets basically for the cups and spoons. She loves to pretend she is mixing things or putting little objects in the cup. We have bought many of these over the years and she always enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Pankey

customer_reviews.title: Two 2year olds love water tea parties
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for no flowers! Boys father appreciate it. Two 2year olds love water tea parties. Love that it is dishwasher safe. I bought extras for birthday gifts for friends kids.
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the set. My 3 year old son was very much into tea parties after watching Alice in Wonderland so we looked around for something. There were several other brands but when he saw the colors on this he wanted it. It's great because it's sturdy, easily held by a toddler and adult and the multiple colors help with learning since he likes to name the colors. It's been fun and I recommend this product, especially if you have a rambunctious toddler like I do!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Puskas

customer_reviews.title: Durable enough for a class to use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my pre K class. Tea sets are very popular with the toddler set. These seem well made and durable and the size is a bit more substantial than any other plastic sets I've seen. I think the kids are going to love them. As always, delivery etc. was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but tiny
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and there are a lot of parts. Its kinda small. It does hold water so that makes it fun. Nice starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This tea set does the job and my kids are happy, but I'm quite disappointed in the value for the money. The set is made of thin plastic. I realize there is a description of the dimensions, so I shouldn't have been surprised at how small the items are, but I was anyway. There's nothing wrong with it, but after seeing it, I regret paying what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size for a 2 year old and have already ...
customer_reviews.text: Since my granddaughter only opened her Christmas present of the Kidzlane Play tea set yesterday it's difficult to leave a true review short of only playing with her with it for less than 24 hours. Good size for a 2 year old and have already taken some serious bumps and crashes with them that they seem to be holding up well with. Colorful and enough pieces to keep her busy for some time!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L. Mahar

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: The dishes are well made. Nice bright colors, heavy duty plastic. My grandson serves the best pretend meals on the plates. This is actually my second set. I now have a granddaughter from a different daughter. So each grandchild has a set now.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Bee lady 🐝

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really loves this tea set I actually washed it and she put real tea in it we had a blast😊 its rel good buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shanaqua

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Grandson has lots of fun with this kid friendly tea set. Water everywhere but lots of fun. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey girl

customer_reviews.title: The dishes are nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: The dishes are nice and thick, without being brittle. The lid stays on the teapot very well. The lip of the spout is well formed, and doesn't dribble when pouring. My two year old absolutely loves it, and will play with it until I get tired of refilling it. Additional love for the bright colors--girls can be so much more than pink. Pro tip: don't fill it with more water than you don't mind cleaning up, at least with someone as young as my girl. :)
customer_reviews.author: E K.

customer_reviews.title: My Boys LOVE this tea set!
customer_reviews.text: My boys played with our friend’s daughter’s tea set and they loved it! I was so happy to find a set for them and they’ve been playing with it alllll afternoon. It will be a lot of fun this summer by the pool to make lemonade!
customer_reviews.author: DVW

customer_reviews.title: This Tea Set is the BEST.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 sets to give as gifts. This tea set is extremely durable and well made. The primary colors make it a perfect fit for both boys and girls. As a Nanny and a grandmother, I have had countless tea parties using the Kidzlane Tea Set and can attest to how using a child's imagination can never go out of style! It's a great way reinforce manners, polite conversation and fine motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Cheap Set for a Kid
customer_reviews.text: I like the gender neutral colors of this set as I got it for my son. It works well and he enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Spell

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: Colorful and durable. Grandkids love playing with it. The set is easy to clean and will never rust.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a favorite for my two year old grandson. He watches Peppa Pig and then has a tea party. I appreciate that the colours are gender neutral so that it's suitable for boys as well as girls. It's very sturdy and has stood up to a lot of play.
customer_reviews.author: Tropical Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great tea set for a boy or a girl
customer_reviews.text: I like the bold colors of the set. Not a pink or baby blue so boys as well as girls can enjoy the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain without being cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well-made tea set. The lids fit well. It will get many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Duck Lover

customer_reviews.title: bright and durable!  perfectly sized for3-5 year old hands.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this tea set. The imagination is running wild around here. He pretends to bake bread and cookies and serves them up to his studies and mommy and daddy and has become a perfect little host.
customer_reviews.author: KA Winter

customer_reviews.title: Love This Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to have tea parties with my grandchildren. I took it to my daughter's house while I was watching her boys and they enjoyed the tea set so much over the five days that I was with them, that I could not take it home with me. I had to order another set to keep at home! The tea set is very durable, well made and a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: This will be a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved out of my parents house to 300 miles away. And my 3 year old nephew (To whom I'm very close with), called me the other day and asked if we could have a tea party when I come up for a visit. So I'm surprising him with this tea set, and a Melissa & Doug Mickey Mouse Clubhouse cookie set. I know he will love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken farmer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for a “boyish” tea set and came across this one. My son absolutely LOVES this set and plays with it all the time. Pieces are very durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: This was a good choice! No pink
customer_reviews.text: We searched and searched for a tea set that was gender neutral for my son. This was a good choice! No pink, and lots of pieces for us to have realistic tea parties with. Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great tea set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my grandson who had a teapot but it leaks water. I finally got tired of water all over my floor and bought him this set. It works great! The pot holds a lot of water, they are very nice form of plastic and he absolutely loves him!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tea pot toy for young children
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a family friend's 3 year old daughter, and she absolutely loves it. Quite durable and colorful too. Everyone was pleased, and it was a gift that she dearly wanted.
customer_reviews.author: hobieguy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little tea set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tea set. I have two grandchildren; they are 3 and 4 years old. When they come to the house we love to have tea parties using real tea!!! Oh what fun we are having!!
customer_reviews.author: beachlady12

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Winner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson's birthday. He did a happy dance when he opened the package, then proceeded to serve everyone at the party some tea! Unlike his sister's "Breakable" tea set, he can play with this to his heart's content. Very well made and would absolutely recommend it for anyone looking for a child's tea set, especially if you want one for a boy.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma709

customer_reviews.title: great little tea set
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that was safe, durable and usable. This little set does all three
customer_reviews.author: Texas Nana

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun for little ones to use for hot chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun for little ones to use for hot chocolate. I liked that it was fun, bold colors - not pink. Boys like to pretend too.:) Just the right size for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 3 year old niece and she loves it. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great "practical life" material
customer_reviews.text: Two year-old immediately enthralled, pouring water from the teapot into the cups and back again. No leaky seams. Also a plus: the 2 lids are interchangeable - they fit the teapot, the cups, and the sugar holder. Great "practical life" material, as Montessori would say.
customer_reviews.author: FDT

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Love tea set!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and durable set for a three year old girl. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Good quality and good value for the price. Colors are perfect! My grandsons love this set and I know they will have many happy hours playing with it outdoors and in the bath!
customer_reviews.author: Miette R.

customer_reviews.title: Really useable!
customer_reviews.text: We love that you can really fill the pot with water and drink from it!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Safe fun
customer_reviews.text: Colorful and fun. Toddler grandson loves pouring and playing and stirring with the teakettle and cups, and his Mom and I love how durable and nonbreakable they are!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: I’d repurchase as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My 22 month old has played with the set more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful for Creative and Safe T-party
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown. Very cute and nice size for my 3-year-old's tea party. Teapot and sugar bowl lids don't close tightly, so beware if your little one puts real liquid etc. inside. Otherwise, glad to partake knowing it's safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Top of the teapot falls right off
customer_reviews.text: The set itself is just ok, I’m upset because the top of the teapot doesn’t remotely stay on, just falls right off when you tilt it.
customer_reviews.author: David landes

customer_reviews.title: the nieces love it
customer_reviews.text: According to the parents (I sent another one at Christmas for another grand niece) the tea set is durable and colorful and the girls love it
customer_reviews.author: jerabby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea time
customer_reviews.text: Best time ever with my 4-2 year old great for little hands .
customer_reviews.author: Lady hawk

customer_reviews.title: Tea Party
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tea set for my daughter, who expressed interest in having a tea party with her stuffed animals. She is very happy with the tea set. And I’m very pleased and satisfied with this tea set
customer_reviews.author: Richard  Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Play with this all the time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandlittle. We play with it all the time. Would purchase from this company again, very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: littlewing08

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: a very cute and sturdy set. Well work the money
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my 2 year old Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: She can pretend and pour and the pots and cups are not heavy or breakable
customer_reviews.author: Joyce J. Sansom

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: kids love this set and it allows for color knowledge, word play conversation....a terrific toy for boys and girls.

product_meta.title: Kidzlane Play Tea Set, 15+ Durable Plastic Pieces, Safe and BPA Free for Childrens Tea Party and Fun
feature_bullets: FUN TOY SET - Your little ones will have a blast hosting tea parties with the use of our deluxe tea set for boys and girls!
15 PIECES - This kid's tea set includes 1 tea pot along with the matching lid, 1 creamer container, 1 sugar cup with lid, 4 tea cups, 4 saucers and 4 stirring spoons.
COLORFUL - The pieces are bright and colorful, making them appealing to young children.
DURABLE - Our children's tea set is extremely durable, which means it will maintain its quality year after year.
SAFE - Made out of BPA-free plastic, the tea cup set is also safe.
